blogPost.excerpt: Collect Colossal Content. Hypto.io takes NFT collection beyond the digital art space and allows its users to collect HUGE moments in internet history from an exclusive network of creators and influencers.
blogPost.body: Collect Colossal Content. Hypto.io takes NFT collection beyond the digital art space and allows its users to collect HUGE moments in internet history from an exclusive network of creators and influencers.
blogPost.title: Hypto - Own viral moments in internet history through NFT blockchain
blogPost.author: Hunter Harrison

localize.description: 收集巨大的内容。Hypto.io将NFT收藏带出了数字艺术领域，让用户从专属的创作者和影响者网络中收集互联网历史上的巨大时刻。
localize.tagline: 通过NFT区块链，拥有互联网历史上的病毒时刻。

localize.description: 收集巨大的內容。Hypto.io將NFT收藏帶出了數字藝術領域，讓用戶從專屬的創作者和影響者網絡中收集互聯網歷史上的巨大時刻。
localize.tagline: 通過NFT區塊鏈，擁有互聯網歷史上的病毒時刻。

next.excerpt: Want to expand your social network and meet interesting people online? Join ChitterChat and be matched one time per week with someone to speak to 1 on 1. Having Twitter will speed up the waiting time dramatically as we can verify you're a real person.
next.title: ChitterChat - Speak to 1 new person every week

localize.description: 想扩大您的社交网络，并在网上认识有趣的人吗？加入ChitterChat，每周匹配一次1对1交谈的对象。拥有Twitter将大大加快等待时间，因为我们可以验证你是一个真实的人。
localize.tagline: 每周与一个新的人交谈

localize.description: 想擴大您的社交網絡，並在網上認識有趣的人嗎？加入ChitterChat，每週匹配一次1對1交談的對象。擁有Twitter將大大加快等待時間，因爲我們可以驗證你是一個真實的人。
localize.tagline: 每週與一個新的人交談
